name: MTLVertexBufferLayoutDescriptor
desc: An object that configures how a render pipeline fetches data to send to the vertex function.

items.name: var stepFunction: MTLVertexStepFunction
items.desc: The circumstances under which the vertex and its attributes are presented to the vertex function.

items.name: var stepRate: Int
items.desc: The interval at which the vertex and its attributes are presented to the vertex function.

items.name: var stride: Int
items.desc: The distance, in bytes, between the attribute data of two vertices in the buffer.

items.name: enum MTLVertexStepFunction
items.desc: The frequency with which the vertex function or post-tessellation vertex function fetches attribute data.
